alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 26 at 2:25PM MDT until May 26 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 225 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Todd Creek, or 21 miles north of Denver, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Dacono around 240 PM MDT. Fort Lupton around 245 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Firestone and Frederick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
